2. atypicality (this is a type of depressive disorder)
3. chronicity (this is a characteristic of some diseases, including mental disorders)
4. psychosis
5. bipolarity (this is a type of mood disorder)
6. secondary onset in the course of a primary psychosis (this is a type of disease progression)
7. paranoid exacerbations (this is a symptom or complication of some diseases)
8. serotonin reuptake inhibitors (while not a disease itself, it is a type of medication used to treat various diseases, including depressive disorders)
